name: Office Relocation Announcement - May 2024
content:
Internal Memo: Office Relocation

To: All SynergyOS Employees

From: Emily Wong, Head of Operations

Date: March 15, 2024

Subject: Office Relocation - May 2024

I am pleased to announce that SynergyOS will be moving to our new headquarters in May 2024. The new office space will better accommodate our growing team and provide enhanced facilities for collaboration and innovation.

New Office Location:

  • Address: 789 Innovation Park, Suite 500

  • Move-in Date: May 15, 2024

  • Building Access: 24/7 with security badge

New Facilities:

  • 20 meeting rooms with video conferencing

  • Innovation lab and testing facilities

  • Expanded break areas and cafeteria

  • Wellness room and gym access

Important Dates:

  1. Packing materials distribution: April 15

  2. Personal item move: May 10-12

  3. Official move: May 13-14

  4. First day in new office: May 15

Next Steps:

  • Complete workspace preference survey

  • Attend virtual office tour (April 1)

  • Schedule moving time slot

Please direct any questions to the relocation team at relocation@synergyos.com.
